sources.title: INCIDENT IN SQUARE 36-80
sources.description:
In the North Atlantic, in the area where Soviet Navy ships conduct maneuvers, a U.S. nuclear submarine suffers an accident. A sailor who has lost his mind activates the computer, which launches two missiles toward the Soviet ships. Soviet sailors shoot down the missiles and sink the submarine. A global catastrophe is averted at a high cost.

INCIDENT IN SQUARE 36-80 | Full movie with english subs. 

Director: Mikhail Tumanishvili
Actors: Mikhail Volontir, Ivars Kalniņš, Boris Shcherbakov, Anatoly Kuznetsov, Paul Butkevich, Vladimir Sedov, Omar Volmer, Vytautas Tomkus, Romualds Ancans, Georgiy Gauze, Gunars Dalmanis, Valery Malyshev, Alexander Pashutin, Tatyana Ronami, Boris Tokarev, Evgenia Uralova, Boris (Bob) Chuprov (Tsymba), Lyubov Chirkova-Chernyayeva

Genres: Action
Release date: 1982
Duration: 78 minutes
Director: Mikhail Tumanishvili
Screenwriter: Yevgeny Mesyatsev
Composer: Viktor Babushkin
Cinematographer: Boris Bondarenko
Production designers: Georgiy Koshelev, Gennady Novozhilov
